ThingDef.label: anima phallus
ThingDef.description: A psychically attuned semi-organic phallus, made of thick vascular roots and warm softwood. It provides a bit of psychic power and attunes to the body's hormonal cycles to induce a sense of composure. It is also not affected by age-related fertility loss.

ThingDef.label: anima uterus
ThingDef.description: A psychically attuned semi-organic uterus, made of moist natural gels and thickly woven anima fibers. It provides a bit of psychic power and speeds up pregnancies that happen within it. It is also not affected by age-related fertility loss.
